arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule

debugLogDeliveryAccounts.description: List of AWS account identifiers to exclude from the rule

excludedAccounts.description: List of AWS account identifiers to exclude from the rule

inputParameters.description: A string in JSON format that is passed to the AWS Config Rule Lambda Function

maximumExecutionFrequency.description: Maximum frequency with which AWS Config runs evaluations for a rule, if the rule is triggered at a periodic frequency. Defaults to `TwentyFour_Hours` for periodic frequency triggered rules. Valid values: `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, or `TwentyFour_Hours`.

policyRuntime.description: runtime system for your organization AWS Config Custom Policy rules

policyText.description: policy definition containing the logic for your organization AWS Config Custom Policy rule

resourceIdScope.description: Identifier of the AWS resource to evaluate

resourceTypesScopes.description: List of types of AWS resources to evaluate

tagKeyScope.description: Tag key of AWS resources to evaluate

tagValueScope.description: Tag value of AWS resources to evaluate

triggerTypes.description:
List of notification types that trigger AWS Config to run an evaluation for the rule. Valid values: `ConfigurationItemChangeNotification`, `OversizedConfigurationItemChangeNotification`

The following arguments are optional:
